LanguageData.sd_bridges_drawbridge_down.label: draw bridge up
LanguageData.sd_bridges_doubledrawbridge_down.label: double draw bridge up
LanguageData.sd_bridges_pontoonbridge.label: pontoon bridge
LanguageData.sd_bridges_pontoonbridge.description: The pontoon bridge can only be placed on water/mud/marsh. It will counter the walking impairment from the terrain. You can not stand on it. It's only a fast water crossing solution.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_DigUpWater.label: dig up water
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_DigUpWater.descript: You colonists will prepare terrain to later terraform it to watertiles. Will create mudy terrain to convert it to shallow water later on.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_ShallowWater.label: shallow water
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_ShallowWater.descri: The shallowest of waters. This can be placed on mud/marsh terrain or on foundation bases to convert them back to shallow water tiles. Shallow water will slow pawns down if they walk over it.
The shallowest of moving waters. This can be placed on mud/marsh terrain or on foundation bases to convert them back to shallow water tiles. Shallow water will slow pawns down if they walk over it.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_DeepWater.label: deep water
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_DeepWater.descripti: Welcome to the Deep. This can be placed on shallow water. It is impassable!
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_ChestDeepMovingWate: Welcome to the Deep. This can be placed on shallow moving water. It is impassable!
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_MarshWater.label: Marsh
LanguageData.sd_bridges_terraform_MarshWater.descript: The marsh makes it hard to walk for your enemies. This can be placed on mud/shallow water terrain or marsh tiles. It can not be placed on deep water. Marsh will slow pawns down if they walk over it.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_seabridge.label: sea bridge
LanguageData.sd_bridges_seabridge.description: This bridge can only be placed on a foundation base. It will counter the walking impairment from the foundation base. Can be deconstructed to put up a platform on the foundation base.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_landbridge.label: land bridge
LanguageData.sd_bridges_landbridge.description: This bridge can be placed on all buildable land tiles supporting light structures. It has a slight movement bonus to mitigate the decrease from natural floors. If you place normal floors under it you can speed your pawns up to have a movement bonus over 100%.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_foundationmaterial.label: foundation material
LanguageData.sd_bridges_foundationmaterial.descriptio: Material used to build structures on water(foundations+platforms). It can be produced at the stonecutters table or machining table out of stuff(metal,stone,wood).
LanguageData.sd_bridges_pontoonbridgepart.label: pontoon bridge part
LanguageData.sd_bridges_pontoonbridgepart.description: Material used to build pontoon bridges on water/mud/marsh. It can be produced at the stonecutters table or machining table out of stuff(metal,wood). Pawns can only walk over pontoon bridges, but not stand on them.
